mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ((select * from lottery_result where code = #{code} and close_time < now() order by open_time desc limit 5) UNION (SELECT * FROM lottery_result WHERE now() < close_time AND code = #{code} ORDER BY close_time LIMIT 2)) lbo ORDER BY expect::INT8

SELECT t1.* FROM lottery_result t1, (SELECT code,MAX(close_time) close_time FROM lottery_result WHERE clock_timestamp() >= close_time GROUP BY code) t2 where t1.code=t2.code AND t1.close_time=t2.close_time
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM sys_user_role WHERE role_id IN ( SELECT role_id FROM sys_role_resource WHERE resource_id = ( SELECT ID FROM sys_resource WHERE url = #{url} LIMIT 1 ) ) ORDER BY user_id
